text: Lepinia is a genus of plant in the family Apocynaceae first described as a genus in 1849. It is native to various islands in the Pacific Ocean.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant Families ;Species # Lepinia marquisensis Lorence & W.L.Wagner \- Fatu Hiva in the Marquesas # Lepinia ponapensis Hosok. \- Pohnpei in the Caroline Islands # Lepinia solomonensis Hemsl. \- New Guinea, Solomon Islands # Lepinia taitensis Decne. - Moorea + Tahiti in the Society Islands ==References== Category:Flora of the Pacific Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Apocynaceae genera
title: Lepinia
